name: Kizuna toyuu Na no Pendant with Toybox Stories
overview: Kizuna to Iuna no pendant with Toy box stories is the story of a young boy that someday returns to his old town and got an old friends reunion and meet some of the girls the he loved when he was a child, he start to feel the same about them, and during the game the different choices will leave him with one or with one of the others. The game begins when he returns home and meet his old friend Naori, she will first take him to their high school St. Elsia High School, where most of the game will take place. The main characters are: - Naori Hikawa: She is the main character's best friend when they both were childs. - Nanami Naruse: The other female main character of the game, the player's character meet her when they were childs and he was going to catch the train, and she was crying alone in the train station. - Miako Sigaraki: Classmate of Naori. - Saeko Tanaka: Another classmate of Naori. - Noemi: Another classmate of Naori. The gameplay is choose between different possible answers to advance in the game, depending of the player choices the pendant colour will change or not, if the colour change to yellow or red the relations are going to worse, if stays green the relations with the girls are going well.
